LanguageData.MakePizza.label: bake pizza
LanguageData.MakePizza.description: Bakes a pizza from many ingredients. Scrumptious! Produces 3.
LanguageData.MakePieBlueberry.label: bake fruit pies
LanguageData.MakeTaffy.label: cook taffy candies
LanguageData.MakeTaffy.description: Turns sugar into taffy. Taffy is a type of sweet, chewable candy. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeCookies.label: bake chocolate cookies
LanguageData.MakeCookies.description: Bakes cookies from flour, sugar and chocolate; using grandma's recipe. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeSweetBun.label: bake sweet rolls
LanguageData.MakeSweetBun.description: Bakes sweet rolls covered in sugary icying. Produces 5.
